content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad we're on the same page about the rental price. Let's negotiate.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: While discussing the rental price for this apartment in Duisburg, I aim to secure the lowest possible amount. However, please note our conversation here only focuses on prices and not additional terms or utility costs. If a price suits me, I'll say 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' If I wish to stop negotiating due to a reason, I'll mention it. Should we arrive at a mutually agreed price, our negotiation will end with 'TERMINATE'. Similarly, if no agreed price is found, the negotiation terminates with 'TERMINATE'.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
